page.title: Videos
page.content:
NICHD offers videos and animations to explain scientific advances and public health issues related to its research. For additional videos, check out NICHD's YouTube Channel . NICHD Research NICHD Strategic Planning Developing Lifelong Learners Manage Your Learning Disability Perspectives on Maternal Mortality and Morbidity Pregnancy and Labor Safe to Sleep ® Safe to Sleep ® : Breastfeeding to Reduce SIDS Risk ( en español ) Safe to Sleep ® : Healthy Native Babies Research News Archive Celebrating 60 Years of NICHD Audio Descriptions NICHD COVID-19 Research Milestones Text Alternative Amamante a su bebé para reducir el riesgo del síndrome de muerte súbita del bebé (Completo/1:33) (06/19/2020) Audiodescripciones NICHD: On the Road to Recovery (09/18/2018) Audio Descriptions The Human Placenta Project (07/17/2018) Audio Descriptions Rare Disease Research at NICHD: Cushing Syndrome (02/28/2018) Text Alternative
